about_the_game:
Grow a simple seed into a flourishing ecosystem full of life, machinery and delicious meals.

  • Balance your tree and its flow carefully to not break any branches.
  • Expand roots to unearth new capabilities.
  • Cultivate over a hundred fruit variations and serve them raw or cooked before they rot to passing-by bees.
  • Receive help from your little residents.
  • Build and manipulate ingenious tracks and fruit-powered mechanisms to automate production.

Create anything you wish at each new game, from a relaxing suspended garden up to a finely tuned citadel. Whether you optimize every detail or simply enjoy the good life: you pick your own branch!

short_description: Welcome into the life of a tree. Grow a flourishing ecosystem, host tiny animals, cook them delicious meals and tinker with ingenious machinery. Now it's up to you to find the ideal equilibrium.
